fields.name: path_prefix
fields.label: Base URL
fields.description: The base URL of this site. Useful for sites hosted under specific path, e.g.: https://www.example.com/my-site/

fields.name: favicon
fields.label: Favicon
fields.description: A square icon that represents your website

fields.name: description
fields.label: Site Description
fields.description: The default site description used in meta data.

fields.name: stackbit_file_path
fields.label: Site Configuration File Path
fields.description: The file path of the file that stores this data

fields.name: title
fields.label: Header Title
fields.description: The title displayed in the header if logo image not specified

fields.name: logo
fields.label: Logo
fields.description: The logo image displayed in the header

fields.name: logo_alt
fields.label: Logo Alt Text
fields.description: The alt text of the logo image

fields.name: has_nav
fields.label: Enable Navigation Menu
fields.description: Display the navigation menu bar in the header

fields.name: nav_links
fields.label: Navigation Menu Links
fields.description: List of navigation links in header

fields.name: has_nav
fields.label: Enable Navigation Menu
fields.description: Display the secondary navigation menu in the footer

fields.name: nav_links
fields.label: Navigation Menu Links
fields.description: List of navigation links in footer

fields.name: has_social
fields.label: Enable Social Links
fields.description: Display social links in the footer

fields.name: social_links
fields.label: Social Links
fields.description: The list of social links displayed in the footer

fields.name: content
fields.label: Footer Content
fields.description: The copyright text displayed in the footer

fields.name: links
fields.label: Links
fields.description: A list of links displayed in the footer

fields.name: id
fields.label: ID
fields.description: A unique identifier used when filtering posts, e.g. "john-doe"

fields.name: link
fields.label: Link
fields.description: The link to the author page, e.g. "blog/author/john-doe"

fields.name: id
fields.label: ID
fields.description: A unique identifier used when filtering posts, e.g. "news"

fields.name: link
fields.label: Link
fields.description: The link to the category page, e.g. "blog/category/news"

fields.name: excerpt
fields.label: Excerpt
fields.description: The excerpt of the page displayed in meta data

fields.name: stackbit_url_path
fields.label: URL Path
fields.description: The URL path of this page relative to site root. For example, the site root page would be "/", and post page would be "posts/new-post/"

fields.name: stackbit_dir
fields.label: Directory
fields.description: The directory path where this file is stored

fields.name: date
fields.label: Date
fields.description: The publish date of the post

fields.name: image
fields.label: Featured Image
fields.description: The image shown in the blog post and blog feed

fields.name: image_alt
fields.label: Featured Image Alt Text
fields.description: The alt text of the featured image

fields.name: excerpt
fields.label: Excerpt
fields.description: The excerpt of the page displayed in the blog feed and meta data

fields.name: stackbit_url_path
fields.label: URL Path
fields.description: The URL path of this page relative to site root. For example, the site root page would be "/", and post page would be "posts/new-post/"

fields.name: stackbit_dir
fields.label: Directory
fields.description: The directory path where this file is stored

fields.name: stackbit_url_path
fields.label: URL Path
fields.description: The URL path of this page relative to site root. For example, the site root page would be "/", and post page would be "posts/new-post/"

fields.name: stackbit_dir
fields.label: Directory
fields.description: The directory path where this file is stored

fields.name: show_recent
fields.label: Show recent posts
fields.description: Show the specified number of recent posts. Should not be used with author and category filters.

fields.name: recent_count
fields.label: Number of recent posts to show

fields.name: content
fields.label: Content
fields.description: The text content of the section

fields.name: background_color
fields.label: Background Color
fields.description: The background color of the section

fields.name: align
fields.label: Align
fields.description: The alignment of the text content

fields.name: image_alt
fields.label: Image Alt Text
fields.description: The alt text of the image

fields.name: background_color
fields.label: Background Color
fields.description: The background color of the section

fields.name: background_image
fields.label: Background Image
fields.description: The image displayed in the background of the section

fields.name: background_image_opacity
fields.label: Background Image Opacity
fields.description: An integer between 0 and 100. A lower value makes the image more transparent.

fields.name: background_image_size
fields.label: Background Image Size
fields.description: The size of the background image

fields.name: background_image_repeat
fields.label: Background Image Repeat
fields.description: Repeat the image to cover the whole area.

fields.name: content
fields.label: Content
fields.description: The text content of the feature

fields.name: align
fields.label: Align
fields.description: The alignment of the text content

fields.name: image_alt
fields.label: Image Alt Text
fields.description: The alt text of the image

fields.name: no_follow
fields.label: No follow
fields.description: Add rel="nofollow" attribute to the link
